name: lab journal-Ashcroft
description: A thick binder containing streamlined procedures for signalling extra-dimensional entities and conducting transactional exchanges...

name: lab journal-Chen
description: This folder contains a stack of printouts detailing cognitive and physiological exercises for interacting with and manipulating non-standard materials using... human metabiology? These look like they're written by machines than anything human. There are also a stack of handwritten notes and analysis by a different author speculating on hypothetical uses for principles outlined in the printout.

name: lab journal-Durand
description: This paper notebook is full of schematics for devices that operates on arcane principles. Most of these were noted to be failures, but some had yielded interesting results

name: The Art of Breathing
description: A tattered binder containing a manual on an esoteric form of meditation. It looks like it was photocopied off of an older manuscript. There is only the first three chapters available, though...

name: The Art of Breathing
description: An old, practically falling apart book containing the intructions for an esoteric martial art. Some of the earlier chapters are missing.

name: The Crimson Wind
description: A complete guide to Crimson Wind style.
